mapper.select: select account.id, account.user_name, account.password,account.type, record.email, record.telephone_number, record.rank from account account left join accountDetailRecord record on account.id = record.account_Id where account.user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into account (id, user_name, password) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
